meanings.definition: The act or process of examining one's own thoughts or feelings.
meanings.sent1: Her introspections helped her understand her emotions better.
meanings.sent2: His daily introspections allowed him to gain insight into his behavior.
meanings.sent3: During her introspections, she discovered a new way to approach her problems.
meanings.sent4: His introspections acted as a mirror, reflecting his innermost desires.
meanings.sent5: Through introspections, she delved deep into her psyche.

meanings.sent4: The introspections of the writer shone through in his introspective novels.
meanings.sent5: The introspections of the philosopher influenced his philosophical views.
